overview: Putra and Luna's marriage have reached their one-year anniversary, but it is clear that their relationship is heading towards the rocks. Putra loses himself in finding inspiration for his next novel by reading indie books. One day, he come across an interesting sentence written by a woman in one of the pages in an indie novel that he borrowed and Putra decides to make it his mission to find and meet the mysterious woman.
tagline: She came to fill the time
title: Muka Surat Cinta
